questions.question_text: "route" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A path or course taken to get from one place to another
questions.example_sentence: The app suggests the safest route based on current traffic conditions.
questions.explanation:
道順・ルート
乗り物の種類
天気予報
支払いシステム

questions.question_text: "alert" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A warning or notification about something
A location where bicycles are stored
A map used only by tourists
questions.example_sentence: Users receive an alert if a road becomes temporarily closed.
questions.explanation:
警告・通知
自転車置き場
修理道具
観光客向け地図

questions.question_text: "tracking" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The act of recording or monitoring movement
The process of cleaning a bicycle
A parking system for electric bikes
questions.example_sentence: The app includes tracking features that show your distance and speed.
questions.explanation:
追跡・記録
自転車清掃
競技イベント
電動自転車の駐車システム

questions.question_text: "temporary" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Lasting for a short period of time
questions.example_sentence: A temporary detour is in place near Central Park.
questions.explanation:
一時的な
気温の
非常に危険な
法律で禁止された

questions.question_text: "accessible" の意味はどれでしょう？
questions.example_sentence: All bike stations are accessible via the city’s cycling app map.
questions.explanation:
アクセスしやすい
高価な
専門家専用
料金に関係する
